A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It would be a fun movie if it weren't a Star Wars movie. I don't want to spoil anything\, so I will simply say\, this was a film made to make money\, and not made for the Star Wars fans themselves. There was a lot of dumb stuff in here\, and a mismanagement of plot resources. This is the last Star Wars Movie I will be watching\, until Disney can start telling a good Star Wars story again.
